GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_UPDATERELATIONSHIPMANAGERWITHPC ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
DECLARE @ADDEDBYID varchar(50) SET @ADDEDBYID = @changeagentid
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate
DECLARE @CONSTITUENTSELECTION TABLE ( id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @CONSTITUENTSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@CONSTITUENTSELECTIONID)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------- declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1 declare @I_MAX int = 1
insert into @T select ID from constituent where id in (select id from @CONSTITUENTSELECTION)
declare @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier declare @PC uniqueidentifier declare @RM uniqueidentifier
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @CONSTITUENTID = CONSTITUENTID from @T where PK = @I -- --check for current primary coordinator select top 1 @PC = reciprocalconstituentid from relationship r left outer join dbo.RELATIONSHIPTYPECODE as T on T.ID = R.RELATIONSHIPTYPECODEID where r.relationshipconstituentid=@CONSTITUENTID and T.DESCRIPTION = 'PRIMARY PORTFOLIO'
if (@PC is not null and @@Rowcount>0) begin delete from relationshipmanager where constituentid=@CONSTITUENTID and fundraiserid<>@PC
select top 1 @RM = fundraiserid from relationshipmanager where constituentid=@CONSTITUENTID and fundraiserid=@PC
if (@RM is null or @@Rowcount=0) begin insert into relationshipmanager (constituentid, fundraiserid, addedbyid, changedbyid, dateadded, datechanged) values (@CONSTITUENTID, @PC, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE )
set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + 1
end end
set @I = @I + 1 -- end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch
